description:
These durable boots are built for outdoorsy kids. Great for hiking and all kinds of adventuring. Does it Fit? sockliner allows you to adjust the fit slightly for growing feet. Comfy mid sole and chassis keeps busy feet supported and cushioned all day long.

  • Uppers are leather and synthetic fabric
  • Waterproof membrane keeps feet dry and protected in all kinds of weather
  • Fully gusseted tongue keeps debris out
  • Sockliner lets you create volume inside the boot for growing feet
  • Toddler sizes (10-12) feature a bungee closure for easy on and off. Youth (13-3) and Junior (3.5-7) have laces
  • OrthoLite footbeds for all day cushioning and support
  • Moulded EVA footbeds provide lightweight cushioning and shock absorption
  • Outsoles are rugged, non-marking rubber (34% recycled), lugged for durable traction
name: Timberland Mt Maddsen Waterproof Mid Boots - Children to Youths
